document_data.name: Brazen Buck
document_data.mainbody: The '''Brazen Buck''' was an [[inn]] and [[tavern]] on the [[Arnrock]] in the [[Lake of Steam]] as of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: It was located within [[Sleeping Hollow]], the island's closest approximation of a town.
document_data.Services: The Brazen Buck was both the only inn and the only tavern on the island, and its proprietor, [[Belathra Kyndle]] was the only non-[[halfling]] on the island. Her inn was the only place in which other non-halflings could find lodgings and drink.
document_data.History: Along with the rest of the settlements on the island, the inn was lost after the Arnrock erupted in the {{YearlinkName|1386}}.
